attach.description: Attach Syncano Instance to current directory
examples:
[90mSelect existing Instance from list[39m
  $ syncano-cli attach

[90mAttach to given Instance[39m
  $ syncano-cli attach INSTANCE

[90mCreate given Instance if it does not exists[39m
  $ syncano-cli attach INSTANCE --create

[90mCreate given Instance if it does not exists and use given location[39m
  $ syncano-cli attach INSTANCE --create --location=eu1

create.name: create
create.description: Create instance if it does not exists

location.name: location
location.description: Location in which instance will be created

examples:
[90mCreate a backup[39m
  $ syncano-cli backup:create

[90mRemove oldest backup if limit was hit and create a backup[39m
  $ syncano-cli backup:create --rotate

rotate.name: rotate
rotate.description: Remove oldest backup if limit was hit

examples:
[90mCreate a backup[39m
  $ syncano-cli backup:create

[90mRemove oldest backup if limit was hit and create a backup[39m
  $ syncano-cli backup:create --rotate

[90mRemove backup by id[39m
  $ syncano-cli backup:delete [ID]

[90mRemove all backups[39m
  $ syncano-cli backup:delete --all

[90mCreate a hosting[39m
  $ syncano-cli hosting:add ./path/to/public

[90mCreate a hosting with CNAME[39m
  $ syncano-cli hosting:add ./path/to/public --cname my-domain.com

[90mCreate a hosting with given name[39m
  $ syncano-cli hosting:add ./path/to/public --name staging

args.name: hostingName
args.description: name of the hosting to list files from

args.name: hostingName
args.description: name of the hosting to delete

args.name: hostingName
args.description: name of the hosting to list files from

examples:
[90mCreate a hosting[39m
  $ syncano-cli hosting:add ./path/to/public

[90mCreate a hosting with CNAME[39m
  $ syncano-cli hosting:add ./path/to/public --cname my-domain.com

[90mCreate a hosting with given name[39m
  $ syncano-cli hosting:add ./path/to/public --name staging

[90mChange hosting CNAME[39m
  $ syncano-cli hosting:config staging --cname staging.my-domain.com

args.name: hostingName
args.description: name of the hosting to sync (all if not provided)

init.description:
Initialize Syncano project in current directory
Create Syncano Instance and attach it to current directory.
Syncano config and sockets directory will also be created.
examples:
[90mRun initialization wizard[39m
  $ syncano-cli init

[90mStart project with given instance name[39m
  $ syncano-cli init my-instance

[90mCreate project in given location[39m
  $ syncano-cli init my-instance -l eu1

[90mCreate project with given template[39m
  $ syncano-cli init my-instance -t @syncano/template-project-hello

location.name: location
location.description: Location in which instance will be created

template.name: template
template.description: Template of files structure used to init project

args.name: location
args.description: name of the location (possible options: us1, eu1)

examples:
[90mDeploy all Sockets[39m
  $ syncano-cli deploy

[90mDeploy multiple Sockets in parallel[39m
  $ syncano-cli deploy --parallel

[90mDeploy single Socket[39m
  $ syncano-cli deploy SOCKET_NAME

[90mRemove .dist and .zip from Socket before deployment[39m
  $ syncano-cli deploy SOCKET_NAME --force

[90mStop deployment on error[39m
  $ syncano-cli deploy --bail

force.name: force
force.description: Remove socket .dist and .zip directories before deployment.

bail.name: bail
bail.description: Stop deployment when one of sockets fails to compile or deploy.

socket:hot.description: Deploy Sockets and watch for changes
examples:
[90mDeploy Sockets and watch for changes[39m
  $ syncano-cli hot

[90mDeploy single Sockets and watch for changes[39m
  $ syncano-cli hot my-socket

[90mMonitor Socket calls. Does not work with async Sockets.[39m
  $ syncano-cli hot --trace

args.name: socketName
args.description: name of the Socket (all if not provided)
